1.content:
You woke up on a hot summer day. The light shined on your body blurring your vision. You were not able to move away from your position so you just waited till the sun went away. After your vision came back you noticed that you were lying on the floor and it wasn't the one in your room. Under you was a pink carpet, quite fluffy but a bit dirty. You could not move your head so your view was limited. On the wall was posters of an asian band to you it looked like you were in a room of a kpop fan. The rest was also very girly so you must be in a girl room.

Suddenly you saw how a person got put of its bed. You couldnt quite see her but she came closer and closer till it hits you. The brown hair that stopped by her shoulder, the slightly chubby build with her curves, the slight hint of freckles she has on her cheeks and her chocolate brown hair. It was your friend nadine! You didnt see her for 2 years now since you moved away from your old town. You were happy yet quite frightened as she was gigantic. Hee eyes then starred at you as she said" oh there..."
1.title: A familiar place

choices: Oh perfectly timmed im going on my moening hike
My younger sis will be happy
14.content: Socks?! Camille?! Who is camille you thought as nadine grabbed you. " i guess i have to bring them back to her" nadine said as she dressed herself and grabbed you. You were freaking out as she stuffed you in her backpocket. It was tight and you got pressed against her butt. Nadine went outside and you immediately noticed the sun as it starts to get hot in her pocket. After what felt like eternity you heard the ringing of a doorbell as you got taken out of her pocket. The door opened and a black haired asian girl opened the door. She looked quite messy with oily hair but was wearing a sport bra and shorts. " you left them by me yesterday so i thought you want them back" camille responded with..
14.title: Are camille's socks

info.brief_description: One day you woke up as an object in your friend nadine's room
